attributes.action: Allow Mr Tul Bahadur Pun V.C. to come to the U.K. for the urgent medical treatment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This brave 84 year old ex soldier, who fought for Britain in WW2,was awarded the VC, and who now has been denied urgently needed medical treatment in the UK needs our support. Let him come to this country. We owe him our gratitude

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
